overview: VTK (Visualization Toolkit) is an open-source software system for 3D computer graphics, image processing, and visualization. It provides a wide range of tools and algorithms for creating and interacting with visualizations of scientific data, making it a versatile platform for researchers, engineers, and developers in various disciplines.
core_features: Support for volume rendering, surface modeling, and data processing
Integration with Python, C++, and other programming languages
Extensive library of visualization algorithms and tools
